turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a hot Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No but I'd like it to be a Skinny. Meaning no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh and please have them use coconut milk instead of regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so I have a grande Hot Skinny Caffe Mocha. No whip. Cocunut milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct. Please order from the Starbucks on Hasler Blvd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink has been ordered from the Starbucks on Hasler Blvd. It will be ready shortly and your receipt will come to your mobile phone via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're more than welcome. Was there anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll do it for now.
